author: CBS News
title: Ceres farmers worry of environmental hazards from potential dumping, trucking operations | Flipboard
text:
Ceres farmers worry of environmental hazards from potential dumping, trucking operations Frustrations are growing from a group of farmers near Ceres who say a neighbor is allowing big rigs and industrial materials onto his property.
CBS News • 1h
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->energy and resource

author: Maria Merano
title: Tesla Cybertruck provides emergency charge to Rivian R1S
text:
A Tesla Cybertruck recently helped a Rivian R1S on a family road trip with a quick charge for the rest of its journey.
“My neighbor shared this picture with me. He got an emergency charge on his Rivian R1S by a Tesla Cybertruck on a road trip with his family,” shared Kitty Adama Hoksbergen on LinkedIn. “He is too pissed off at the moment to tell me the story, but I can be he was stranded by an unreliable, third-party CCS.”
The picture shows the Tesla Cybertruck’s Powershare technology in action.
Powershare provides up to 30kWh per day via bidirectional charging, enabling the Cbyertruck to power a construction site and, yes, even another electric vehicle.
Hoksbergen is the Executive Director at Adopt a Charger, Inc., a nonprofit organization that aims to expand fee-free electric car chargers through sponsors. Given her career, Hoksbergen seems all too aware of the need for more EV chargers in North America in widely used public places like parks and beaches and along frequently traveled roads and highways—for those long road trips like the one her neighbor was on with his family.
Besides the need for more EV chargers in North America, there is also the question of which connector will dominate the industry. Before the wide adoption of Tesla’s North American Charging Standard (NACS), the industry seemed to favor the Combined Charging System (CCS) as a standard for charging connectors. However, CCS charging stations have proven unreliable, with customers reporting issues ranging from a lack of internet connection for payments to frequently broken charging stalls.
As more automakers in North America dive deeper into electric cars, they have started to realize the critical role charging stations play in the industry. With its Supercharger Network, Tesla has the experience to help expand the charging infrastructure in North America.
Rivian is among the automakers that have announced the
adoption of Tesla NACS. In 2024, Rivian R1 owners will receive a free adapter for the NACS plug. By 2025, the company plans to roll out electric vehicles with the NACS charge port as standard.
The Teslarati team would appreciate hearing from you. If you have any tips, contact me at or via X
@Writer_01001101.

author: 自由時報電子報
title: 錄取台大14人、電機資訊63人！ 大學放榜彰中亮眼
text:
錄取台大14人、電機資訊63人！ 大學放榜彰中亮眼
彰中在今年大學升學表現出色，透過特殊選才、繁星與申請入學3大管道，已有約25％的學生錄取國內頂尖大學，其中錄取台大14人，包含2人錄取最具競爭力的台大電機系。（記者張聰秋攝）
〔記者張聰秋／彰化報導〕今年大學申請入學今天放榜，彰化高中傳來捷報，其中最受矚目的是科學班學生陳柏溢成功考上陽明交通大學醫學系。他的母親是秀傳醫院加護病房的護理長，從小耳濡目染醫療環境，讓他立下從醫志向，希望未來也能走進臨床現場，守護病人生命。
為了朝目標邁進，陳柏溢高中時積極參與專家指導課程，先修大學普通生物學，還進入大學教授研究室進行科學探究，以「水草重量與淨生態系生產量之關聯性」為題，展現出對醫學與環境議題的雙重關懷與熱情。
請繼續往下閱讀...
除了陳柏溢的亮眼表現，今年該校整體錄取成績同樣出色。校方表示，目前透過特殊選才、繁星與申請入學3大管道，已有約25％的學生錄取國內頂尖大學，其中錄取台灣大學者有14人，包含2人錄取最具競爭力的台大電機系。另外也有63人錄取電機、資訊相關科系，佔上榜者18%。
校方分析指出，此一趨勢顯示，隨著近年科技產業蓬勃發展，學生在選填志願時更重視未來就業出路，「選系不選校」成為主流考量。
另1位令人動容的學生是楊承達，錄取台北大學法律系。他是家中獨子，自幼喪父，由來自越南的新住民母親一手扶養長大。課餘時間除了分擔家務、照顧家庭，還主動學習越語，擁抱自身多元的成長背景。
楊承達不僅擔任學生會會長，推動校內改革，也曾返鄉辦理「偏鄉科學與人文探索營」，回到國中母校服務學弟妹。他曾在國語演說比賽中奪得彰化縣第一與全國優等，更在今年畢業典禮擔任司儀，主持功力強，展現強大的語言魅力，成為以生命歷練打動人心的典範。
彰中考生陳柏溢（左）考上醫科，榜單揭曉，教務主任吳國禎（右）肯定其勤奮向學的求知態度。（圖由學校提供）
